Articles.Content:
I'm working on a mod for KSP and I was wondering if a single pod can have 2 doors. Is that possible?

Edited January 10, 2016 by Koening
Yes, you can have multiple doors. Only thing is it'll favour one of them when using the EVA button on the portrait.

Thanks for the answer. That helps a lot!!  One last question can you select which door/hatch the pod will favour?

Edited January 10, 2016 by Koening
type error

I haven't tried to sort out how the game selects the favorite airlock...  but my guess is that it will probably be the one that comes first in the Unity hierarchy.  That failing it could be something like alphabetical order by name...  Let us know if you figure it out!
I will. But I still have a long way to go. I'm currently stuck in the modeling fase.
Btw do you know how I can change my profile name because I made a typo it should be Koeing. An reference toe Boeing because that's the mod I'm making
